cast.original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
cast.overview: After years of being sheltered from the human world, the Turtle brothers set out to win the hearts of New Yorkers and be accepted as normal teenagers through heroic acts. Their new friend April O'Neil helps them take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.
cast.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem

crew.overview: After years of being sheltered from the human world, the Turtle brothers set out to win the hearts of New Yorkers and be accepted as normal teenagers through heroic acts. Their new friend April O'Neil helps them take on a mysterious crime syndicate, but they soon get in over their heads when an army of mutants is unleashed upon them.
crew.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem

details.biography: Kyler Spears was born on July 5, 1992 in Elk Grove, California, USA as Kyler Aldon Spears. He is known for his work on Amphibia (2019), Axe Cop (2012) and We Bare Bears (2014).
details.name: Kyler Spears
